textHome: I am a web developer who creates websites for businesses and individuals. I turn ideas into digital solutions that attract attention and add value.
aboutDetails1: I am a passionate web developer focused on creating engaging and intuitive digital experiences. With over 3 years of experience, I specialize in building modern and responsive interfaces using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Express, and WordPress.
aboutDetails2: I have had the opportunity to collaborate on various projects, helping to turn ideas into robust and functional digital solutions. One of my standout projects is the Author Notation Generator, based on the Cutter table.
subTitle: Services
service1Text: I build applications using technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Express, and WordPress.
service2Text: I create websites with engaging and intuitive interfaces that capture attention and deliver value.
service3Text: I offer specialized consulting in website development and design, helping you achieve your digital goals.

Skill.title: Skills
Skill.description1: I have a natural ability to solve problems efficiently and practically.
Skill.description2: I have experience in software development, using modern frameworks and libraries.
Skill.description3: I am always looking for new knowledge and techniques to improve my skills.
Skill.description4: I also have good communication skills and am able to write clean and easy-to-understand code.

experience.title: Experience
experience.text: Over 3 years of experience in web development, working with various clients and projects.

education.title: Education
education.text: Graduated in Computer Science from the University of São Paulo, with a specialization in web development and design.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.projeto1Description: The Self Portrait Project was developed for the Quilombola Development Network Eparrei, aiming to train 60 quilombola youth in experimental photography production. I built the website using React JS for the interface, Styled Components for responsive design, and Vercel storage for hosting and content storage.
projects.projeto2Description: Vaz Bookshop is a second-hand book sales page, offering a wide selection of affordable titles. The site was developed using NextJS, React, and TailwindCSS to provide a user-friendly and efficient interface.
